Dr. Romny Om
Deputy-Director Institute of Technology of Cambodia
"Distance Learning is dedicated to enhancing learning"

Welcome to the Institute of Technology of Cambodia (ITC). Our goal is enriches new ideas on establishing partner Distance-Learning network among huge member universities in Asia under technical supervising of the School of Internet (SOI-Asia) project. The objective of these activities is providing access to quality educational programs and support initiatives developed in collaboration with universities from around Asia. I wish that we find this resource enlightening and helpful in this academic pursuit.
In addition, ITC specializes in engineering degree programs for students who are interested in specialty areas for which there may be a curriculum.

In keeping with our high standards and philosophy of service, ITC in collaborating with others member universities of distance learning programs are structured in such a way as to provide the highest quality courses of flexibility for our students. This flexibility by necessity includes many important aspects, not the least of which is affordability.

The Institute of Technology of Cambodia works with partnerships from such organizations as the Japanese Universities Association, the School of Internet under supervise of KEIO University and Steering Committee from represent member universities to ensure that all students under member universities are being apprised of not only the most current management principles but also the strategies relevant to the ever-changing local work force and global economy, stable environment management, and understanding of the network/distance learning environment configuration and knowledge for network management, etc.

ITC is constantly remarking itself for its students' benefits while pursuing an excellent Distance-Learning status. We are aiming to create an active and interesting instate ready to meet the challenges of the future.
Consequently, students who had engaged from these programs are prepared not only to understand established business practices, but also to anticipate and respond to future trends as well.
